TextLibrary.Text: The Wyvern flew away! You will need to find another one.
You wrap the Wyvern in cloth to take back to Drong.
Drong gives you some brightly colored magical stones.
You must travel to the Wyverns' Roost, northwest of Gluk and obtain a Wyvern for Drong to eat.
You must return the Wyvern to Drong's Tower.
